title: Social Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using e-Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related basic knowledge and digital communication experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education combining e-mentoring and social learning techniques in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more network expansion strategies through mentor-mentee interactions in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can present case studies demonstrating a 20% or greater improvement in role-performance confidence using social learning tools.
Learners can analyze the impact of e-mentoring on job productivity using three or more indicators through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
